name: Wyndham Garden Manassas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only stayed here for one night, but I couldnt fault it. I thought it was excellent value for the money and well located for what we wanted in the area. it was clean and it was a good size room. Staff on reception were friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Great Value for money

description: Wyndham Garden Manassas is located 25 minutes southwest of Washington, D.C. We are easily accessible from I-66, US 234 & US 29 and convenient to all Washington area airports.
